title: Federal judge in Boston warns Trump against targeting immigration status of students suing him
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News The order aims to protect a group of noncitizen students from retaliation for suing the Trump administration.

A federal judge in Boston has ordered the Trump administration to stop arresting or deporting international students and academic faculty involved in a First Amendment lawsuit against the federal government.

title: Celtics fall in final seconds against Bulls despite gritty Jaylen Brown game: 7 takeaways
author: Tom Westerholm
bullets: Boston Celtics The Celtics have a much-needed day off before a much-needed stretch of home games, which begin on Monday against the Trail Blazers.

title: The Patriots are back, and so are the old, miscast feelings of ESPN bias against the team
author: Chad Finn
bullets: New England Patriots The notion that the network has a disdain for the Patriots was a recurring claim during the two-decade dynasty, and has now returned in force.

title: Patriots set to welcome back WR Mack Hollins from IR for AFC title game
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots Hollins has missed the last four games due to an abdominal injury.
